signup.choose-language: Welcome. Please choose your language from the options below.
error_unknown: An error occured please try again later
get_started_guide:
Welcome to MegaEx, the fast and secure multi-cryptocurrency wallet and peer-to-peer Bitcoin exchange.

You can read the getting-started guide for more information on using MegaEx for using the crypto wallet, trading and security practices.
tc_privacy: Please read our [Terms](https://google.com) and [Privacy Policy](https://google.com). Tap on *I Agree* from input below to accept.
select_currency:
ğŸ’µ *Select Currency*

Select your local fiat currency from the options.

ğŸ’¡ You will buy/sell bitcoins in the selected currency.
initial_message: Your account is now ready! Tap on the options from input below to start.
info_message:
ğŸš€ *Info*

Mega is a simple and secure P2P bitcoin exchange bot and wallet.

*Notifications*

"_Invite your friends using your referral link so they receive free 1mBTC(limited period) and you will make 35% on their trading fees forever."
unknown_message:
Sorry, could not understand your request.

MegaEx is a fast and secure multi-cryptocurrency wallet and peer-to-peer Bitcoin exchange.

You can read the getting-started guide for more information on using using the wallet, trading and security guidelines.

show_referral_link_info:
ğŸ¤ *Referral Link*

ğŸ’° Share your referral link to earn Bitcoins.

Any new user from registered using link will become your referral forever, you will *earn 35%* of the fees we take from your referral.

Payouts will be processed daily and credited to your wallet.
